channel.title: Comments on: Endings and Beginnings
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Xavier
item.dc:creator: Xavier
item.description: When did you start? When and why did you decide to move to China? Why do you decide to return?
item.content:encoded: When did you start? When and why did you decide to move to China? Why do you decide to return?

item.title: By: Mary Bourassa
item.dc:creator: Mary Bourassa
item.description: Thank you for sharing this post and your experiences overseas. Your ideas have helped not only your students, but mine also, and for that I thank you. I look forward to hearing about your next chapter.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for sharing this post and your experiences overseas. Your ideas have helped not only your students, but mine also, and for that I thank you. I look forward to hearing about your next chapter.
